trans-unit.source: Provides extension methods for retrieving <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa" /> implementations for the public and private keys of a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> certificate.
trans-unit.target: Fournit des méthodes d’extension pour la récupération des implémentations de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa" /> pour les clés publiques et privées d’un certificat <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: The ECDSA certificate.
trans-unit.target: Certificat ECDSA.

trans-unit.source: The private ECDSA key.
trans-unit.target: Clé ECDSA privée.

trans-unit.source: Combines a private key with the public key of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa" /> certificate to generate a new ECDSA certificate.
trans-unit.target: Combine une clé privée avec la clé publique d’un certificat <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa" /> pour générer un nouveau certificat ECDSA.

trans-unit.source: A new ECDSA certificate with the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.HasPrivateKey" /> property set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Nouveau certificat ECDSA avec la propriété <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.HasPrivateKey" /> définie sur <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The input ECDSA certificate object isn't modified.
trans-unit.target: L’objet de certificat ECDSA d’entrée n’est pas modifié.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> or <paramref name="privateKey" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> ou <paramref name="privateKey" /> a la valeur <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The certificate already has an associated private key.
trans-unit.target: Le certificat est déjà associé à une clé privée.

trans-unit.source: The certificate doesn't have a public key.
trans-unit.target: Le certificat n’a pas de clé publique.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The specified private key doesn't match the public key for the specified certificate.
trans-unit.target: La clé privée spécifiée ne correspond pas à la clé publique du certificat spécifié.

trans-unit.source: The certificate.
trans-unit.target: Certificat.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa" /> private key from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> certificate.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la clé privée <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa" /> du certificat <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: The private key, or <see langword="null" /> if the certificate does not have an ECDsa private key.
trans-unit.target: Clé privée, ou <see langword="null" /> si le certificat n'a pas de clé privée ECDsa.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The certificate.
trans-unit.target: Certificat.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa" /> public key from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> certificate.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la clé publique <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa" /> du certificat <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: The public key, or <see langword="null" /> if the certificate does not have an ECDsa public key.
trans-unit.target: Clé publique, ou <see langword="null" /> si le certificat n'a pas de clé publique ECDsa.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The handle is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Le handle n'est pas valide.
